Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: $(this.trait:road:name)

Running $(this.trait:road:directions), this stretch of $(this.trait:road:name) is lit by overheaddimly lit by the sputtering flames of small oil lamps scattered around the periphery of the area. is composed of $(this.trait:road:material) worn smooth by the passage of time and travelers. $(this.trait:road:features)

Running $(this.trait:road:directions), this stretch of $(this.trait:road:name) is lit by overheaddimly lit by the sputtering flames of small oil lamps scattered around the periphery of the area. $(this.trait:road:features)

Running $(this.trait:road:directions), this stretch of $(this.trait:road:name) is lit by overheaddimly lit by the sputtering flames of small oil lamps scattered around the periphery of the area. is composed of $(this.trait:road:material) worn smooth by the passage of time and travelers. $(this.trait:road:features)
occasional speck of ash falling from the sky
Occasional specks of ash fall from the sky.
one of the nearby buildings
Buildings clustered around the area make it difficult to see all but the largest of landmarks.
the nearby buildings
Buildings clustered around the area make it difficult to see all but the largest of landmarks.
the Cathedral in the distance

The Cathedral in the distance towers higher than almost any other structure, the glittering colors of the stained glass dome sparkling under the light of the day glowing luminescent from the lights within.
the smoking Citadel in the distance
The massive structure of the Citadel rises high above the city to the north, with smoke rising from it.
the massive wall surrounding the city
Massive stone walls surround the city of Rinascita, protecting it from all manner of threats that might advance upon it.

the dew-dampened warm, dry warm, dry cool, dry cool rain-drenched cool wet dew-dampened dewy cool, damp dewy cool dry hot, dry hot, dusty dry, dusty warm rain-soaked wet frosty, dew-dampened damp, cool cool, damp sun-warmed warm cool, dry dewy cool, dew-damp frost-covered damp, dewy snowy, frost-covered snow-swept icy, snow-covered completely snow-covered snow-blanketed heavily snowed over icy, snow-covered thickly snow-covered snowy, iced-over limestone pavement

The dew-dampened warm, dry warm, dry cool, dry cool rain-drenched cool wet dew-dampened dewy cool, damp dewy cool dry hot, dry hot, dusty dry, dusty warm rain-soaked wet frosty, dew-dampened damp, cool cool, damp sun-warmed warm cool, dry dewy cool, dew-damp frost-covered damp, dewy snowy, frost-covered snow-swept icy, snow-covered completely snow-covered snow-blanketed heavily snowed over icy, snow-covered thickly snow-covered snowy, iced-over limestone pavement beneath your feet.
the softly sputtering lanterns scattered around the area
Large oil lanterns scattered around the area provide a sputtering light to the area at night.
the scents of the city
A heady mix of wood smoke, cooking food, lantern oil with the faintest tinge of salt water fill the air around you.
dark shadow nearby
Shadows play in the recesses of the periphery of the space.
haze of smoke in the air
A subtle pervasive haze of smoke fills the air.
the sounds of the city
The city is filled at all hours of the day and night with faint, persistent sounds of life.
one of the windows
Small windows set in the nearby windows break up the facades of the structures.
the windows along the street
Small windows set in the nearby windows break up the facades of the structures.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ \{ A \{ tall \| somber \| scowling \| hunched \} \{ man \| constable \| hooded figure \| priest \} \{ quickly \| quietly \| surreptitiously \| swiftly \| hurriedly \} \{ stalks \| skulks \| strides \| pads \| travels \} through the area, \{ eyeing you\| grunting derisively \| narrowing his eyes at you \| scoffing \| spitting to the side \} before disappearing down a narrow side street. \| Appearing to be lost, a \{ willowy \| waifish \| malnourished \| dirty \| sorrowful \} \{ young girl \| child \| girl \| young woman \| woman \} \{ gazes longingly \| suspiciously narrows her eyes \| sighs wistfully \| whimpers fearfully \| grunts softly \} at you before disappearing into the murky darkness of a nearby alley. \| A pair of \{ well-dressed \| haughty \| sophisticated \| darkly clothed \| tall \} \{ gentlemen \| merchants \| men \| noblemen \} casually stride through the area, conversing loudly about \{ the recent reports from their associates\| the price of labor being too high\| cutting subsidies for the poor\| closing the soup kitchen to cut costs\| the ghastly mismanagement of church funds\}, their voices fading as they disappear into the distance. \| A \{ group \| pair \| small group \| duo \| trio \} of \{ extravagantly \| richly \| lavishly \| colorfully \| sumptuously \} dressed \{ women \| young noblewomen \| noblewomen \| girls \} floats through the area amidst an entourage of armed guards, their \{ chatter \| laughter \| giggling \| snide remarks \| haughty snickering \} briefly disturbing the otherwise quiet surroundings. \| A \{ passing man \| hurried merchant \| well-dressed priest \| portly constable \| nobleman \} tosses a half-eaten \{ roll \| apple \| scrap of food \| haunch of bread \| morsel of food \} over his shoulder as he moves through the area. Within moments, a \{ group of small children \| starving boy \| waifish child \| pair of tiny children \| scrawny girl \} appears out of nowhere to scoop up the trash before sprinting away into the distance. \| The oppressive sensation of being watched washes over you; scanning the area reveals nothing to the eye but the ear catches the sound of footsteps retreating into the darkness of a nearby alleyway. \| The disembodied voices of a hushed conversation just barely break through the sounds of the area before the noise is lost once more to the span of distance. \} \}

X[S] \{ \{ \ \{ A \{trio \| group \| collection \| duo \| few \} of \{ men \| women \| children \} \{ hurry \| bustle \| pass \| travel \} through the area with the dawn of the new day. \| A \{ young \| well-dressed \| tall \| chipper \| working class \} man \{ strolls \| strides \| walks \| passes \| hurries \} through the area, pausing only to dip his head before disappearing into the distance. \| A \{ skinny \| scrawny \| muscled \| tall \} young man \{ whistles to himself \| nods in passing \| casually waves \| dips his head \} before continuing into the distance as the work day begins. \| The streets begin to fill with more and more people as the day dawns anew. \| A young boy with a broom busily works through the street, sweeping away loose stones and debris before disappearing into the distance. \| A stooped older man pulls a cart filled to the brim with jars of milk, pausing to leave one on a nearby doorstep before disappearing into the distance. \| A scrawny young boy runs through the street, pausing to ensure that the lanterns have been extinguished and refilled with oil before continuing further along the thoroughfare. \| The muffled sound of voices in the distance heralds the dawning of a new work day as people begin to fill the streets. \} \ \} \{ \ \{ Passing with a flurry of swift movement, a \{ group \| pair \| gathering \| trio \| handful \} of \{ young \| well-dressed \| elderly \| skinny \} women pass through the area, \{ lugging baskets of dirty laundry \| carrying large baskets of bread \| herding a few young children \| ushering a trio of small girls \| carrying armloads of fresh groceries \} with them as they hurry to their morning duties. \| A \{ pair \| trio \| group \| few \} \{ well-dressed \| auspiciously dressed \| finely attired \| dapper \| sophisticated \} \{ young \| business \| merchant \| noble \} men \{ stride \| saunter \| cruise \| step \| stroll \} through the area, \{ animatedly talking \| hushedly whispering \| heatedly arguing \| debating loudly \| bantering laughing \} with one another as they continue into the distance. \| Barely slowly her pace, a \{ young \| frazzled \| skinny \| scrawny \| gaunt \} \{ girl \| woman \| lady \| child \| adolescent \} \{ nods \| dips her head \| flashes a smile \| bobs \| curtsies \} before hurrying away further along the road. \| The streets are a flurry of motion and traffic as people travel every which way during the busy morning hours. \| The streets are abuzz with sound and activity as morning lights the streets around you. \| A young girl swiftly passes through the area, her arms laden with a huge pile of dirty laundry. \| A group of young boys saunters through the area, laughing as they jostle one another back and forth before disappearing further into the distance. \} \ \} \{ \ \{ The streets fill with the smell of food as the sun reaches the apex of the sky overhead. \| A \{ small \| scrawny \| gaunt \| skinny \| thin \} \{ young \| dirty \| waifish \| unkempt \| wide-eyed \} \{ child \| boy \| girl \| adolescent \} \{ sneaks \| skulks \| pads \| creeps \| enters \} into the area, silently \{ staring at you \| searching the ground for scraps \| rummaging through a nearby trash bin \| glaring at you \| peeking at you \} before sprinting away farther down the street. \| A \{ group \| collection \| few \| mass \| gathering \} of \{ well-dressed \| affluent \| young \| noble \| finely-attired \} \{ men \| women \| men and women \| businessmen \| merchants \} \{ stroll \| meander \| mince \| travel \| move \} through the area, \{ murmuring \| chatting \| talking \| laughing \| whispering \| debating \} with one another as they continue farther down the street. \| The street is momentarily filled with a flood of bodies as workers break for the midday meal. \| A large group of people moves every which way as they pass through the streets en route to elsewhere. \| The buzz of talking and laughing can be heard in the distance as the streets fill with activity during the midday hour. \} \ \} \{ \ \{ In continual flux, the streets are populated by waxing and waning numbers of people traveling to and from various locations. \| \{ Swiftly \| Hastily \| Hurriedly \| Quickly \| Busily \} \{ striding \| stepping \| rushing \| moving \| pacing \| sauntering \} through the area, a \{ young \| tall \| dapper \| skinny \| small \} \{ boy \| man \| child \| girl \| woman \} pauses long enough to nod before continuing into the distance. \| A \{ pair \| trio \| group \| few \} \{ well-dressed \| auspiciously dressed \| finely attired \| dapper \| sophisticated \} \{ young \| business \| merchant \| noble \} men \{ stride \| saunter \| cruise \| step \| stroll \} through the area, \{ animatedly talking \| hushedly whispering \| heatedly arguing \| debating loudly \| bantering laughing \} with one another as they continue into the distance. \| Passing with a flurry of swift movement, a \{ group \| pair \| gathering \| trio \| handful \} of \{ young \| well-dressed \| elderly \| skinny \} women pass through the area, \{ lugging baskets of dirty laundry \| carrying large baskets of bread \| herding a few young children \| ushering a trio of small girls \| carrying armloads of fresh groceries \} with them as they rush home for the afternoon. \| A buzz of activity fills the streets with the afternoon bustle of people traveling to and from various locations. \| A small boy scurries into the area, washing a nearby trash bin before scuttling away into the distance. \| Footsteps in the distance fill the area with continual sound as people move to and fro farther down the street. \} \ \} \{ \ \{ A \{trio \| group \| collection \| duo \| few \} of \{ men \| women \| children \} \{ hurry \| bustle \| pass \| travel \} through the area with the setting of the sun. \| A \{ young \| well-dressed \| tall \| chipper \| working-class \} man \{ strolls \| strides \| walks \| passes \| hurries \} through the area, pausing only to dip his head before disappearing into the distance. \| A \{ small \| scrawny \| gaunt \| skinny \| thin \} \{ young \| dirty \| waifish \| unkempt \| wide-eyed \} \{ child \| boy \| girl \| adolescent \} \{ sneaks \| skulks \| pads \| creeps \| enters \} into the area, silently \{ staring at you \| searching the ground for scraps \| rummaging through a nearby trash bin \| glaring at you \| peeking at you \} before sprinting away farther down the street. \| A \{ pair \| trio \| group \| few \} \{ well-dressed \| auspiciously dressed \| finely attired \| dapper \| sophisticated \} \{ young \| business \| merchant \| noble \} men \{ stride \| saunter \| cruise \| step \| stroll \} through the area, \{ animatedly talking \| hushedly whispering \| heatedly arguing \| debating loudly \| bantering laughing \} with one another as they continue into the distance. \| A small child hurries into the area, ensuring the lanterns are filled and lit as the sun sinks gradually below the horizon. \| The streets gradually become quiet as the sun sets and the skies grow darker. \| Muffled footsteps can be heard from further along down the street, retreating into the distance before disappearing completely. \| A soft whispering sound can be heard from somewhere in the distance, noticeable only in the brief moments of quiet. \| A flickering from a nearby lantern briefly causes the shadows to dance over the nearby buildings. \} \ \} \{ \ \{ A \{ group \| collection \| few \| mass \| gathering \} of \{ well-dressed \| affluent \| young \| noble \| finely-attired \} \{ men \| women \| men and women \| businessmen \| merchants \} \{ stroll \| meander \| mince \| travel \| move \} through the area, \{ murmuring \| chatting \| talking \| laughing \| whispering \| debating \} with one another as they continue farther down the street. \| The street is quiet for a moment, the dark of night cushioning it in a blanket of shadow. \| A lone figure \{ strides \| saunters \| steps \| passes \| moves \} through the area, nodding in silence as he continues out of sight along the shadowy streets. \| A \{ small \| skinny \| waifish \| scrawny \| tiny \} young child hurries swiftly through the darkened street, the pace quickening as she retreats into the distance. \| A \{ murmur \| whisper \| flurry of activity \| series of footsteps \| rustle of movement \} can be heard further along the street, gradually retreating into the distance. \| A small group of people passes through the street, nodding silently as they pass further into the shadowy streets. \| The nearby lamp sputters with a pop, the darkness deepening before the flame returns once more to life. \| The fluttering of the flame in the oil lanterns further down the street cause shadows to dance and dart over the facades of the nearby buildings. \} \ \} \{ \ \{ A \{ young \| cloaked \| tall \| hooded \| lone \} man \{ strolls \| strides \| walks \| passes \| hurries \} through the area, pausing only to dip his head before disappearing into the distance. \| A \{ small \| scrawny \| gaunt \| skinny \| thin \} \{ young \| dirty \| waifish \| unkempt \| wide-eyed \} \{ child \| boy \| girl \| adolescent \} \{ sneaks \| skulks \| pads \| creeps \| enters \} into the area, silently \{ staring at you \| searching the ground for scraps \| rummaging through a nearby trash bin \| glaring at you \| peeking at you \} before sprinting away farther down the street. \| \{ Swiftly \| Hastily \| Hurriedly \| Quickly \| Busily \} \{ striding \| stepping \| rushing \| moving \| pacing \| sauntering \} through the area, a \{ young \| tall \| dapper \| skinny \| small \} \{ boy \| man \| woman \} pauses long enough to nod before continuing into the distance. \| The streets are vacant for a moment, the press of the shadowy darkness seeming somehow darker with the silence. \| A sputtering flame gradually dies out, the darkness swiftly drawing in to take the place of the light. \| A soft whispering sound followed by footsteps can be heard in the distance, retreating further into the darkness before disappearing completely. \| A momentary hush falls over the city, the midnight hour blanketing the surroundings in darkness. \} \ \} \{ \ \{ A \{ young \| cloaked \| tall \| hooded \| lone \} man \{ strolls \| strides \| walks \| passes \| hurries \} through the area, pausing only to dip his head before disappearing into the distance. \| A \{ murmur \| whisper \| flurry of activity \| series of footsteps \| rustle of movement \} can be heard further along the street, gradually retreating into the darkness. \| The darkness blankets the area, amplifying any small sound amid the quiet of the pit of nightfall. \| A lone, haunting owl's cry pierces the silence of the late-night hour, the sound a chilling and lonesome sound amid the otherwise quiet city streets. \| A flame sputters in a nearby lantern, the light causing long shadows to dance in eerie patterns along the fronts of the nearby buildings. \| A lone figure cuts in front of a lantern further down the street, his form briefly casting a long shadow before he disappears again into the darkness. \| The sound of footsteps gradually grows closer, a lone figure nodding silently in passing before continuing onward into the dark and shadowed streets. \} \ \} \}
